Name: Nocturnal

Traits.Name: Monstrosity
Traits.Description: Takes 1 turn after every player character turn. If slow, only one of its turns is affected.

Traits.Name: Colossus
Traits.Description: Has phasing for characters and terrain smaller than it and can end turn in those spaces. Ignores engagement from smaller characters. Ignores movement penalties for terrain.

Traits.Name: Dodge
Traits.Description: Immune to all damage and effects on miss or successful save. Resistant to damage from non-attack spaces of area effects.

Traits.Name: Finishing Blow
Traits.Description: Deal bonus damage if character is bloody.

Actions.Name: Juggernaut
Actions.Description: At the start of its turn, can save against all statuses and marks and clear all blights as a free action.

BodyParts.Name: Head
BodyParts.Description: Nocturnal always has the Blood Scent trait (phase 3) active.

BodyParts.Name: Back
BodyParts.Description: Nocturnal loses its Clinging Mists trait in phase I. Back spines can be sold for 2 dust if broken.

BodyParts.Name: Wings
BodyParts.Description: Nocturnal loses its ability to fly. Its Rake action becomes a dash instead.

PhasesDescription: Phase change triggers at the start of each round. The Nocturnal starts in phase II and can shift up or down one phase (so it can’t shift from I to III for example). It must shift phases.

Traits.Name: Hunter
Traits.Description: Deals boosted damage to characters with no adjacent allied character or summon.

Traits.Name: Clinging Mists
Traits.Description: The Nocturnal is intangible and not visible on the map unless in range 3 of a foe or summon controlled by a foe.

Actions.Name: Rake
Actions.Description: Fly in a line 4 area effect. Characters along the path take fray damage.

Actions.Name: Amygdala
Actions.Description: A character in range 3 must save or be forced to flee, become Vulnerable, Winded, and shoved 4 in a direction of the Nocturnal’s choice.

Actions.Name: The Horror
Actions.Effect: May teleport up to 3 spaces towards target before the attack.

Actions.Name: Rake
Actions.Description: Fly in a line 4 area effect. Characters along the path take fray damage.

Actions.Name: Amygdala
Actions.Description: A character in range 3 must save or be forced to flee, become Vulnerable, Winded, and shoved 4 in a direction of the Nocturnal’s choice.

Actions.Name: Great Fell Shot
Actions.Description: Mark 2 unoccupied spaces in range 8. Foes or allies that pass through these spaces take piercing magic fray damage as an area effect. Disappear at the start of next round.

Actions.Name: Blood Drain
Actions.Effect: If made against a character with Vigor, removes all Vigor before applying damage.

Traits.Name: Frenzy
Traits.Description: when hitting with an attack, gains +1 action.

Actions.Name: Swat
Actions.Description: Adjacent foe must save or be shoved 3 and staggered.

Actions.Name: Death Grasp
Actions.Description: A foe in range must save. On a failure, they take light magic damage and are shoved up to 3 spaces towards Nocturnal. On a successful save, shove them 1 space.

Actions.Name: Blood Drain
Actions.Effect: If made against a character with Vigor, removes all Vigor before applying damage. Can use Embrace.

Combos.Name: Embrace
Combos.Description: Adjacent character must save. On a successful save, they are shoved 1 and take light piercing physical damage. On a failed save, they are reduced to half their current hit points, or 1 hp, whichever is higher, and the Nocturnal gains vigor 1.
